title: SP13 "Episode of Skypiea"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Sorajima" (Japanese:エピソードオブ空島) Tetsuya Endo Tomohiro Nakayama August 25, 2018(2018-08-25) 105 minutes
transformers_text:
SP13 "Episode of Skypiea"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Sorajima" (Japanese:エピソードオブ空島) Tetsuya Endo Tomohiro Nakayama August 25, 2018(2018-08-25) 105 minutes

An abridged remake of the Skypiea story arc.[n 9]The Straw Hats discover a map toSkypiea, a supposedly mythical civilization in the sky. They soon meetMont Blanc Cricket, who directs them to a natural underwater explosion which serves as transport to the islands in the sky. Once in Skypiea, the Straw Hats are targeted by the tyrannical rulerEneruand his subordinates, as well as local rebels. Luffy defeats Eneru, bringing peace to Skypiea, and proves to Cricket that Skypiea is not a myth.
